titles.title: For the relief of Oleg Rasulyevich Rafikov, Alfia Fanilevna Rafikova, Evgenia Olegovna Rafikova, and Ruslan Khamitovich Yagudin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 10/2/1998--Introduced. Declares four named individuals to be eligible for issuance of immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of aliens lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
